column4: Hi people! I my problem is that i have a pretty tired digital camera. Colors are bad, but except for that, its a ok camera. Anyone knows about a tool in ubuntu or one of the programs where colors can be ajusted/corrected automaticly. There is a function for that i Vista i know..  If not, could this be a idea for a EOG upgrade? :)
You can use The GIMP to do color correction. I don't know if it does auto-correct, but if not there's probably a plugin for it.

Thanks:) I found the color correction posibilities there, but I found my self to be pretty bad ajusting it.. Usually photos turned out a lot worse than the originals :)   Ill try to find a plugin for it then. Thanks for helping!
You can ask in #gimp which plugin would be best.
